name: Mission - Mars
description:
In this game, you have to fly a rocket and land it safely on its landing pad without hitting any obstacle.

Instructions to play the game:-

(1) use the space bar to give thrust to the rocket, use the D key to move right, and use the A key to left.

(2) dodge the obstacles and land on the green-colored landing pad.

(3) there will be 4 levels and if you finish all of them, the game will automatically restart.

This game is made by Rishit Nagar, I hope you like playing this game and enjoy it.
